vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H2453H', 'matchingForm': 'חַכְמוֹנִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'chakh.mo.ni', 'gloss': 'Hachmoni', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.27.32', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '哈革摩尼', '_es_Gloss': 'Hacmoni', '_zh_Gloss': '哈革摩尼'}, {'strongNumber': 'H8461', 'matchingForm': 'תַּחְכְּמֹנִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'tach.ke.mo.ni', 'gloss': 'Tahchemonite', '_searchResultRange': '2Sam.23.8@2Sam.23.8-1Chr.11.11', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '他革捫人', '_es_Gloss': 'Tachmonita', '_zh_Gloss': '他革扪人'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Hachmon or Tahchemon(?), only mentioned at 2Sa.23.8; also called Tahchemonite (KJV: Tachmonite; NIV: Tahkemonite) at 2Sa.23.8;
Also named: tach.ke.mo.ni (תַּחְכְּמֹנִי "Tahchemonite" H8461)
§ Hachmoni or Hachmonite = "wise"
n pr m
1) father of one of David's mighty warriors
2) father of the tutor of David's sons
n patr m
3) the family of one of David's servants
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre de Jasobeam, guerrero, en tiempos de David; (b)   padre de Jehiel, funcionario, en tiempos de David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈摩尼 或 哈革摩尼 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "智慧"
1) 一位大衛的大能勇士的父親 (代上 11:11)
2) 大衛眾子的師傅的父親 (代上 27:32)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
哈摩尼 或 哈革摩尼 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "智慧"
1) 一位大卫的大能勇士的父亲 (代上 11:11)
2) 大卫众子的师傅的父亲 (代上 27:32)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.32;
father of: Jehiel (H3171I)
§ Hachmoni or Hachmonite = "wise"
n pr m
1) father of one of David's mighty warriors
2) father of the tutor of David's sons
n patr m
3) the family of one of David's servants
